scripts.init: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (!(Test-Path 'backend/.venv')) { py -m venv backend/.venv }; if (!(Test-Path 'backend/.env')) { Copy-Item 'backend/.env.example' 'backend/.env' }"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:mobile
scripts.dev: concurrently -n API,MODEL,MOBILE -c blue,magenta,green "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:model" "npm run dev:mobile"
